argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: SQL::ResultSet
argument.description: A SQL::ResultSet object created with a DIM statement.

page.description: Position to the next row in the ResultSet.
page.discussion: The NextRow() method fetches the next row in the SQL::ResultSet.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim rs as SQL::ResultSet dim connString as C dim select_exp as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v8\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" select_exp = "select * from customer" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.execute(select_exp) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) conn.close() end end if rs = conn.ResultSet rs.NextRow() ui_msg_box("Some data", rs.data(2) + " " + rs.data(3)) conn.close()

section.description: The following script fetches through a ResultSet and places the contents of the FieldName field into the FieldValue variable.
section.example: while (rs.NextRow()) FieldValue = rs.Data(FieldName) ... do something end while

section.description: The following script builds a list of lastname field values.
section.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim rs as SQL::ResultSet dim connString as C dim select_exp as C dim names as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v8\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" select_exp = "select * from customer" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.execute(select_exp) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) conn.close() end end if rs = conn.ResultSet while rs.NextRow() names = names + rs.data(3) + crlf() end while ui_msg_box("Some data", names) conn.close()
